data.message: Hey, My Friends Fackbook Id was hacked by using a phising site, Can you plz help me to recover this account ? my friends facebook login id was 01625195844, but after hacking the account hacker changed the mobile number and give a email address as a login id. so when i try to recover the account, a recovery code send to that email address and that email address belongs to them. so i cant recover this account.  unfortunately i am unable to see their full email address, but their email address "b********6@i********.com"  plz help me to recover my account or if you need any information regarding these plz let me know.. waiting for your response.

replies.message: Hi Rabin. If your friend's account was taken over by someone else, please ask them to follow these steps to secure it: http://bit.ly/2wHhvLz. Thanks! -Caitlin
Hello rebin my friend facebook hacked u fix???? If u fix tell me how
